title: Development of a Project-Based Learning (PjBL) Model for Vocational Schools: Designing Applied Mathematics Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Math application project-based learning environment for in-service professionals. Operates mobile learning and formative assessment centered on BYOD. Aims to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies applicable to welding industry settings

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform trigonometric and geometric calculations required for welding structure design using mobile tools.
Through project-based team activities, learners can complete equation modeling for welding cost estimation and validate it with real-world data.
Learners can self-diagnose weekly project progress and incorporate feedback through formative assessment tasks provided on mobile learning platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
